description:
Aggregate all interactions with a stakeholder (emails, meetings, document exchanges, comments) into a unified chronological timeline. Include search, filtering, and the ability to annotate key moments or turning points in the relationship.

**Rationale:** Understanding stakeholder engagement history is critical for relationship management. A consolidated view helps teams maintain continuity, avoid redundant outreach, and identify engagement patterns.
title: Stakeholder Communication History Timeline
